item.title: PYPL
item.description: score:187 Chances: Analysts think this stock should be worth 30% more. PayPal’s cross-border money transfer service, Xoom, now allows U.S. users to fund money transfers using USD converted from PayPal USD, a U.S. dollar-denominated stablecoin. Recently, Zacks.com users have been paying close attention to PayPal (PYPL).

item.title: SHOP
item.description: score:-119 Chances: Shopify (SHOP) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately, indicating a potential positive sentiment towards the stock. Great companies in steadily growing industries can deliver enviable returns through the years, suggesting a positive outlook for Shopify’s future growth potential.
